snippet.title: MEGA MAN PERFECT BLUE - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing MEGA MAN PERFECT BLUE, a currently in-development Mega Man fangame, brought to you by director RRThiel and his band of merry men. Blast through 4 robot masters worth of unique mechanics, art, and music, as you stop Dr. Wily's evil plans!

WELCOME TO THE ULTRAMEGA EXPERIENCE.

GET THE DEMO OST HERE:
https://rrthiel.bandcamp.com/album/mega-man-perfect-blue-demo-ost

THE TEAM:
-AbsoluteLoser - https://twitter.com/AnAbsoluteLoser - code
-CSketch - https://twitter.com/TheSketchyMan - level design/trailer
-Cruise Elroy - https://twitter.com/itsCruiseElroy - level design/art/character design/code
-TheSkipper1995 - http://twitter.com/theskipper1995 - level design
-MiniMacro - https://twitter.com/MiniMacroSound - tileset artwork
-Noivs - https://twitter.com/DeaderCtulu - character artwork
-Caliginous - https://twitter.com/Caliginous_arts - character artwork/character design
-Lu_Nachi - https://twitter.com/Lu_Nachi - character artwork
-rcrdcat - https://twitter.com/rcrdcat - character artwork
-Schmiddi - https://twitter.com/Schmidkalkan - character artwork
-Pegg - https://twitter.com/peggdraws - character design/concept artwork
-Unlimited Trees - https://twitter.com/UnlimitedTrees - background/tileset artwork
-RRThiel - https://twitter.com/RRThiel - director/musician/character design/perfect hero
